name: Reikai Doushi
overview: Reikai Doushi is one of the first arcade 1-on-1 fighting games. Main hero is a Chinese exorcist who battles various demons. He must beat all opponents and decapitate them. All characters look like dolls. The game is based on motion capture animation with clay figurines (like Clayfighter). Gameplay is typical for the genre, with one notable exception - edges of the screen are a teleport.
